definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
to cross a river/to aid or relieve/to be of help
only used in 濟濟|济济[ji3 ji3]
used in place names associated with the Ji River 濟水|济水[Ji3 Shui3]/surname Ji
complicated/many/in great numbers/abbr. for 繁體|繁体[fan2 ti3], traditional form of Chinese characters

sentences.english: Many people are asking whether China can maintain sustained and long-term development.
sentences.chinese: 许多人会问，中国经济繁荣能不能长期保持下去？

sentences.english: But the latest boom has proved a curse as well as a blessing.
sentences.chinese: 然而，最新一轮的经济繁荣将会是福祸并存。

sentences.english: But an uptick in output does not augur prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 但是，产量上扬并不预示着经济繁荣。

sentences.english: Our country is basking in an economic boom.
sentences.chinese: 我国正处在经济繁荣之中。

sentences.english: And we’re partnering to expand economic prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在为扩大经济繁荣建立伙伴关系。

sentences.english: Tang Dynasty was known for the prosperous economy, flourishing culture and enlightened freedom.
sentences.chinese: 唐代社会开明自由，经济繁荣发达，文化灿烂辉煌。

sentences.english: These "leisure" migrants have brought economic prosperities and employment opportunities to the island.
sentences.chinese: 这些“休闲”的移民带来了经济繁荣和就业机会。

sentences.english: The Tang Dynasty is a period in which Chinese feudal economy developed prosperously.
sentences.chinese: 唐朝是我国封建经济繁荣发展的时期。

sentences.english: That is, to make them restrain booms and ease the retrenchment in the bust.
sentences.chinese: 就是让它们经济繁荣时限制膨胀和在衰退时缓和紧缩。

sentences.english: Living standards improved greatly during the post-war boom…
sentences.chinese: 战后经济繁荣期间，生活水准大幅改善。

sentences.english: The country had been priding itself on its stability and relative prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 这个国家一直为它的稳定与较高的经济繁荣感到骄傲。

sentences.english: By the Chinese dream, we seek to have economic prosperity, national renewal and people's well-being.
sentences.chinese: 中国梦要实现经济繁荣，民族复兴，人民幸福。

sentences.english: The issue of employment involves social stability and prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 就业事关社会稳定和经济繁荣的大局。
